        program combined
        implicit none
        ! Declarations
        integer :: n, k, a, last, c_count, X, i_int
        integer(kind=8) :: i_long, N_long
        integer :: count_357
        character(len=20) :: s_str, temp, next_str
        logical :: flipped
        integer :: j, length
        character :: c

        ! Read n, k
        read(*,*) n, k

        last = -1
        c_count = 0

        do i_int = 1, n
            read(*,*) a
            if (a == last) then
                c_count = c_count + 1
            else
                c_count = 1
            end if
            last = a
        end do

        if (c_count + k > n) then
            X = n - c_count
        else
            X = -1
        end if

        N_long = X

        count_357 = 0
        i_long = 357

        if (N_long >= 357) then   ! we use a while loop, but Fortran has do while
            do while (i_long <= N_long)
                ! Convert i_long to string
                write(s_str, '(I0)') i_long
                s_str = adjustl(s_str)   ! remove leading spaces? but I0 doesn't have leading spaces? but we use len_trim so it's safe.

                end if

                ! Generate next candidate
                temp = ''
                flipped = .false.
                length = len_trim(s_str) do j = length, 1, -1
                    c = s_str(j:j)
                    if (flipped) then
                        temp = trim(temp) // c
                    else
                        if (c == '3') then
                            temp = trim(temp) // '5'
                            flipped = .true.
                        else if (c == '5') then
                            temp = trim(temp) // '7'
                            flipped = .true.
                        else if (c == '7') then
                            temp = trim(temp) // '3'
                            flipped = .false.
                        end if
                    end if
                end do

                if (.not. flipped) then
                    temp = trim(temp) // '3'
                end if

                next_str = reverse_string(trim(temp))

                read(next_str, *) i_long
            end do
        end if

        print *, count_357

        contains

        function reverse_string(s) result(res)
            character(len=*), intent(in) :: s
            character(len=len(s)) :: res
            integer :: i, n
            n = len(s) do i = 1, n
                res(i:i) = s(n-i+1:n-i+1)
